Dear Garima Verma,

Please accept this email as notification that I will be unable to come to the office today, [Insert Date Here], due to personal reasons. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

I have already [Mention any steps taken like informing team members, delegating tasks, setting up an out-of-office reply, etc. Example: 'informed my immediate team of my absence' or 'completed [Task Name] before leaving' or 'delegated my urgent tasks to [Colleague's Name]']. I will be checking emails periodically for urgent matters. 

I anticipate returning to the office on [Insert Return Date Here]. I will provide an update if there are any changes to this plan.

Thank you for your understanding.
